thread.title: Gregory S Parascenzo
thread.title_full: Biblio.com reviewed by Gregory S Parascenzo

author: Gregory S Parascenzo
title: Gregory S Parascenzo
text: I'd been 'researching' a book that we'd had in the family library when I was growing up and had no luck on other book sites (which I won't advertise). After a brief research on Biblio I found the exact volumn that we'd had... This has been part of the process of reconnecting with my sister and our chidhood experiences of what we'd remembered growing up, some of our 'family values' and activities which made up our personas. It's exciting in a way to excavate these memories and reestablish sibbling relationship thru them... we both shared the joy of being kids again... thanks!
